title: CHI St. Alexius Health Offers Hope Through the Holidays (CHI St Alexius Health)
text: ( Source : CHI St Alexius Health ) CHI St. Alexius Health Home Health and Hospice is hosting Finding Hope Through the Holidays , a workshop for individuals who have lost a loved one and are anticipating the holiday season to be a difficult
